title: Wifi Problems
body: Okay this week it was horrible.Why? Well Because I keep disconnecting from the game and normaly I have 80pings and about 50fps but now I have 200pings and around 50fps. Please help me

replies.body: Using a wireless connection can cause network issues like packet loss, which can cause lag and input delays.  The best way to rule out your wireless as the culprit would be to try using a wired connection.  I also suggest using our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to continue troubleshooting and get you fixed up.  I hope that helps!
